column5: Not sure if anyone is interested or not, but I just cancelled our May 26-31, 2008 trip to Tuk Bay outpost with Anderson's Lodge out of Sioux Lookout. It is an outstanding area and time slot. The cabin will accomodate six people. Our group has been going there for 10-12 years, but decided not to go back in 2008. If you would like to call Anderson's...1-800-465-1098 or me ...573-299-4853..I can tell you about the area. I don't have any interest in Anderson's but have been very satisfied with their service for many years. If you're looking for an outpost experience...here's a possibility
